com.google.android.drdat.cl.AlarmRefresh

AlarmRefresh Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This broadcast receiver turns on the periodic task that checks to see if we need bug the participant to do something.

To do something it sends a broadcast which can then be picked up by DrdatGUI's TaskBroadcast to make a notification.

Author:
cal


Public Member Functions

Override void onReceive (Context context, Intent intent)
 use DrdatSmi2TaskList to figure out if we need to bug the participant send broadcast to DrdatGUI's TaskBroadcast if we do

static boolean wasStopped ()
 check whether the alarm was deliberately stopped we can use this to decide whether to leave the alarm off when the task manager gets started: by default it will try and start notifications

static boolean wasStopped (  )  [static]

check whether the alarm was deliberately stopped we can use this to decide whether to leave the alarm off when the task manager gets started: by default it will try and start notifications

Returns:
true if we deliberately stopped the alarm false otherwise
